attributes.action: hold a referendum on an english parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: no honest man could justify the position that the scots can have a parliament while england can not.this p.m.has no mandate for power in england.he has sworn to put the interest of the scots above all.lets have a referendum for an english parliament and if we don,t get a majority the first time we should have another like the scotch did.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
